text: We had a great time in this hotel The rooms were huge and extremely luxurious

staff from Phillipinos were great
Every point he talks was so remarkable, what makes me so touch was by his letter, OMG he even knew our checkout date also so he remind us to wear more warm clothes due to cold weather and wish

First, the room was quite old, and although the room description said there would be refreshments provided - they were very minimal and highly unsatisfactory - there was nothing in the fridge and there were no snacks - only several tea bags and instant coffee were provided - this is definitely not up to standard of a luxury SPG brand hotel
Friendly staffs, clean rooms, beautiful place,lazy river  was really an adventure to try for kids & kids at heart
Definitely a 5-star. I stayed 1 night to experience the Cotai area

the views,the room (was very spacious, high quality decor and amenities) and the fantastic pool (many pools to choose from)

very best in service

No improvement since hotel opening, the check-in problem is extremely bad, people have to queue up for an hour waiting for check-in
Everything very geared up for families.
The helpful staff can show u very yummy local food within walking distance if Japanese & Hot pot restaurant in the hotel is not your choice
the nice staff even assisted with my itinerary during my stay, as well as arranged accommodation for my other relatives who stay at Galaxy which is directly next to Banyan Tree
They got his size and preferences for toiletries and within 30 minutes returned with designer clothes, cologne, and other items We've never experienced such service
This hotel has everything you need and the location is so close to everything that you get there in minutes
Everything in the hotel has been designed with eye for detail, art on the walls, vases around the hotel, ceramic and superb lighting
The staffs were professional and polite especially FO-Jason Lam and Kelvin Li, they are talkative and made us felt warm as well as allow late check out

They were without exception courteous, friendly and very helpful
The normal check in desk had quite a long queue
The room is big and nice
If you are cheap to give out discount, don't even offer it
Delicious and fresh food Free A4 photo , a sorvenir from Venetian to guests  Quiet  Sun shines into my room ,  greats me every morning
On what must be one of their busiest weekends, 4000 rooms fully booked, they decided to only open one pool

We had been at a holiday at Venetian Macau
Comfortable room with amazing bathtub and spectacular view like nowhere else
On arrival you are greeted by a very lengthy roped off pen and staff to tell you 'check in is closed and you must return at 1
We stayed a week in a King size room with Executive Lounge access
I enjoyed the food there very much and the staffs they have there are great special Miss Gladys who is excellent on what she does

I was overwhelmed by how welcome I felt by the greeting (male) receptionist and then almost immediately after by your Guest Relations Manager, Henrique Rocha

Great furniture in the room, the bathroom was magnificent and I had some great nights sleep

The check-in was efficient and friendly
Thank you
I had great experiences in this hotel for sure
staff attitude shown that she is not care about the guest comment/complain

The Good -The rooms were very spacious and well designed

Catherine from the Housekeeping Team who helped drying and cleaning the water around the small pool as our grand daughter was enjoying it

the photograph is that of me admiring the ceiling of the dome
We loved to take our breakfast by the pool side in the nice breeze

Having breakfast served in our room was a delight, the underwater music of the infinity pool was soothing and the large comfortable room with amazing views meant we were very to content to just laze around all day

They gave us early check in and also late checkout gaha thank you front office Luke, Kelvin for their sweet service
I could really go on  This is the best hotel I have ever stayed at in my life The service is outstanding

Good location to visit the old colonial part of Macau
Overall a great experience

Food was very good and abundant pottion were served

The bed is extremely comortable and I slept very well both nights we were there
So far everything went smooth
They have poor service where we put our luggage in the hotel luggage storage reception

I had an early checkin and my room wasn__ ready, and I had had an all night flight, but Gary from the information desk helped me in every way he could

My husband and l were lucky enough to recently have a 4 night break at sofitel ponte 16 in Macau we were in need of some pampering and quiet time after a stressfull few months and a disappointing 7 night tour of Beijing prior, from the time we stepped into the lobby the service was amazing, friendly and sincere from all staff on duty we were escorted quickly to the club floor reception for check in and offered an upgrade to a suite it was beautifull and we felt really special and enjoyed the club room priveleges every day especially the evening cocktails and canapes it was a very special experience had not previuosly been able to afford
Prices is reasonable too
The main pool wasnt opened during my stay, but they have smaller pool for the kids to play
ALso the overall feel is good
All elements refined in detail, we felt like a Royal Family
Housekeeping who clean my room was superb
The facility in the spa is no doubt first class
Check out was very good too and the management
Beware, If you are Elite member of SPG who will arrive in night time, it will be nightmare to check-in the room
During the 3 days staying, Cleaning service was poor that always not give the water then we requested the cleaning service
Moreover, I was able to find the burnt stain on the carpet (3-4 spots)
Great food court on level 3 of the hotel lots of choices from Chinese, Vietnamese, Indian, Italian cuisine at reasonable prices
Buffet breakfast was good, not great variety but fine food
Service from front desk to housekeeping was quick and friendly
